title: e-con Systems Launches an Android USB Web Camera App for Phones / Tablets
text:
e-con Systems Launches an Android USB Web Camera App for Phones / Tablets
e-con Systems launches Webeecam, an Android Application which enables you to connect a Webcam to your Android Phone/Tablet.
St. Louis, MO, August 28, 2015 --( PR.com )-- e-con Systems Inc., a company specializing in imaging solutions and Camera boards, modules has developed a USB camera application for Android Phones and Tablets - Webeecam (http://www.e-consystems.com/android-usb-camera-app.asp?PRAug15).
Webeecam supports any camera that conforms to the USB Video Class Specification (UVC) which includes an array of off-the -shelf webcams. This makes your USB camera portable and allows you to instantly share the captured images using any social media applications. e-con Systems’ intends to add new features every month like the ability to connect multiple UVC USB cameras to the phone/tablet.
"With the next generation of applications and products built around tablets and phones, there is an increasing need for interfacing the common PC peripherals such as USB webcams with these mobile devices. Our Webeecam enables off-the-shelf USB UVC webcams and other specialty UVC cameras such as Microscopes, Borescopes, Thermal cameras etc. on phones and tablets, where tablets can become the processing platform with rich user experience. Customers can benefit from e-con’s expertise to interface specialty cameras with any off-the-shelf Android Phone or Tablet to develop novel applications around these Android devices," said Ashok Babu, President of e-con Systems.
Webeecam provides access to all UVC camera controls like brightness, exposure, etc. supported by the USB Camera and supports all resolutions available with the USB Camera. Apart from Webcams, Webeecam can be used with USB Borescopes, Microscopes and other specialty USB cameras as well.
Customization services
Customers interested in any customization of the application to suit their requirements can contact e-con Systems through sales@e-consystems.com.
Availability
e-con Systems offers a trial version that is completely free and interested customers could download it from Google Play (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.econsystems.webeecamtrial). For more information on the product, please refer product page (http://www.e-consystems.com/android-usb-camera-app.asp?PRAug15). To watch the introduction video of Webeecam please visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qV46_k-6fx8.
About e-con Systems
e-con Systems, a pioneer in embedded product engineering services has been serving customers for over a decade now and has been helping them take products to market. To enable efficient development and quicker time to market, e-con Systems offers OEM products like embedded camera modules, USB cameras, System on Modules which act as building blocks for customer products. e-con Systems has an experienced Android development team and is a leading vendor of Android Camera Drivers, BSPs and Android based Product development services, catering to customers across USA and Europe. For more information on e-con Systems Android Services please visit our page, http://www.e-consystems.com/android-development-services.asp?PRAug15.
